Annotation Interface Constraints

@Retention(RUNTIME) public @interface Constraints
Constraints annotation is used to define layout constraints for UI elements. Properties: specify in percent how much to retreat from the corresponding edge This annotation will consider element's sizes
See Also:
  • ConstraintsIgnoreElementSize
  • ConstraintsAnnotationProcessor
